alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 16 at 10:20AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT SATURDAY NIGHT... ...REPLACES FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding will occur along the Yellowstone River in Prairie County. * WHERE...Prairie County MT. * WHEN...Noon Friday through midnight MDT Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas along the Yellowstone River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1011 AM MDT, Flood waters will continue to make their way downstream along the Yellowstone River. Minor flooding is expected starting noon Friday, lasting into Saturday night. - Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Terry, Fallon, Calypso and Zero. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
